trans-unit.source: Manages user profile data and settings.
trans-unit.target: 管理使用者設定檔資料和設定。

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET profile is used to store and retrieve user settings in a data source such as a database.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 設定檔用來儲存和擷取資料來源，例如資料庫中的使用者設定。

trans-unit.source: The user profile is accessed using the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: 使用存取使用者設定檔<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A>屬性的目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>。

trans-unit.source: Profile information and property values are managed using a profile provider.
trans-unit.target: 使用設定檔提供者管理設定檔資訊和屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager> class is used to manage profile settings, search for user profiles, and delete user profiles that are no longer in use.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager>類別用來管理設定檔設定、 搜尋的使用者設定檔，以及刪除不再使用的使用者設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager> class provides static methods and properties that can be accessed by referencing the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager> class in your application code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager>類別提供靜態方法和屬性，可以參考來存取<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager>應用程式程式碼中的類別。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the Example section in this topic and additional examples in the topics for members of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱本主題中的範例 > 一節和主題中的其他範例之成員的<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager>類別。

trans-unit.source: By default, the user profile is disabled for all ASP.NET applications.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，已停用所有 ASP.NET 應用程式的使用者設定檔。

trans-unit.source: To enable the user profile, set the `enabled` attribute of the configuration element to true, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用的使用者設定檔，設定`enabled`屬性為 true，如下列範例所示的組態項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the user profile, see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d).
trans-unit.target: 如需使用者設定檔的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 設定檔屬性概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d)。

trans-unit.source: A profile provider is used to store and retrieve properties in the user profile.
trans-unit.target: 設定檔提供者用來儲存及擷取使用者設定檔中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework includes a <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider> class that stores user profile properties in a SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 包含<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>類別，以 SQL Server 資料庫中儲存使用者設定檔屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider> instance named `AspNetSqlProvider` is specified in the machine configuration as the default profile provider.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>名為執行個體`AspNetSqlProvider`做為預設設定檔提供者的電腦組態中指定。

trans-unit.source: The `AspNetSqlProvider` instance connects to the SQL Server database on the local Web server.
trans-unit.target: `AspNetSqlProvider`連接至本機 Web 伺服器上的 SQL Server 資料庫的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: You can specify a <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider> that connects to another SQL Server as the default profile provider by using the configuration element and the `defaultProvider` attribute of the configuration element, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>，以連接至另一個 SQL Server 預設設定檔提供者所使用的組態項目和`defaultProvider`的組態項目，如下列範例所示的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that uses the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager> class to manage inactive profiles.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用 ASP.NET 網頁<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager>類別來管理非使用中的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: The property settings to be added.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: Adds a profile property programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 用程式設計方法加入設定檔屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method is functionally equivalent to adding the property to the `profile` section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法在功能上等於新增屬性至`profile`組態檔區段。

trans-unit.source: To call this method to add the profile property, you must make the call in a method that is marked with the <xref:System.Web.PreApplicationStartMethodAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 若要呼叫這個方法，以新增設定檔內容，您必須在以標記的方法進行呼叫<xref:System.Web.PreApplicationStartMethodAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the application for which to store and retrieve profile information.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定應用程式的名稱，以儲存及擷取設定檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: The name of the application for which to store and retrieve profile information.
trans-unit.target: 要儲存及擷取設定檔資訊的應用程式名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager> uses the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ApplicationName%2A> property to associate profile information with different applications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager>使用<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ApplicationName%2A>與不同的應用程式相關聯的設定檔資訊屬性。

trans-unit.source: This enables multiple applications to use the same database to store user information without running into conflicts between duplicate users.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓多個應用程式使用相同的資料庫來儲存使用者資訊而不重複的使用者之間發生衝突。

trans-unit.source: Multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same user database by specifying the same value in the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ApplicationName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 多個 ASP.NET 應用程式可以使用相同的使用者資料庫，藉由指定相同值的<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ApplicationName%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ApplicationName%2A> property can be set programmatically, or it can be set declaratively in the configuration file for the Web application by using the `applicationName` attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ApplicationName%2A>可以程式設計方式設定屬性，或者它可以是以宣告方式設定 Web 應用程式組態檔中使用`applicationName`屬性。

trans-unit.source: If a value is not specified for the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file for the Web application, then the profile providers included with the .NET Framework use the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.ApplicationVirtualPath%2A> property value for ASP.NET applications.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定值`applicationName`屬性為 Web 應用程式組態檔中，則會使用.NET Framework 隨附的設定檔提供者<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.ApplicationVirtualPath%2A>ASP.NET 應用程式的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: For non-ASP.NET applications, the default value is the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.ModuleName%2A> property value, without the file extension.
trans-unit.target: 對於非 ASP.NET 應用程式，預設值是<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.ModuleName%2A>屬性值，不含副檔名。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ApplicationName%2A> property exposes the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider.ApplicationName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the default profile provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ApplicationName%2A>屬性會公開<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider.ApplicationName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性的預設設定檔提供者。

trans-unit.source: The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的預設設定檔提供者`defaultProvider`組態項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, they may be configured with a different application name.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者設定檔包含非預設的提供者設定檔提供者所管理的屬性，它們可能設定為使用不同的應用程式名稱。

trans-unit.source: To access the application name of a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A> property and access the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider.ApplicationName%2A> property of the provider directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取預設提供者以外的設定檔提供者的應用程式名稱，取得使用的設定檔提供者的參考<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A>屬性和存取<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider.ApplicationName%2A>直接在提供者的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Because a single default profile provider instance is used for all of the requests served by an <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ApplicationName%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 因為所有由提供服務的要求會使用單一預設設定檔提供者執行個體<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>物件，您可以有多個要求同時執行，而且嘗試設定<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ApplicationName%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ApplicationName%2A> property is not thread safe for multiple writes, and changing the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ApplicationName%2A> property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ApplicationName%2A>屬性不是執行緒安全的多個寫入，且變更<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ApplicationName%2A>屬性值可能會導致非預期的行為，應用程式的多個使用者。

trans-unit.source: It is recommended that you avoid writing code that allows users to set the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ApplicationName%2A> property unless you require it.
trans-unit.target: 建議您避免撰寫程式碼，讓使用者設定<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ApplicationName%2A>屬性除非您需要它。

trans-unit.source: An example of an application where setting the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ApplicationName%2A> property may be required is an administrative application that manages profile data for multiple applications.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式的範例設定<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ApplicationName%2A>屬性可能需要為系統管理的應用程式管理多個應用程式的設定檔資料。

trans-unit.source: Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application.
trans-unit.target: 這類應用程式應該在單一使用者應用程式並不是 Web 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The following configuration file excerpt shows the element in the section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 下列組態檔摘錄 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案的區段中顯示的項目。

trans-unit.source: It sets the application's default profile provider to a <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider> instance and sets the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ApplicationName%2A> to `MyApplication`.
trans-unit.target: 它會將應用程式的預設設定檔提供者設<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>執行個體和設定<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ApplicationName%2A>至`MyApplication`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the user profile will be automatically saved at the end of the execution of an ASP.NET page.
trans-unit.target: 取得布林值，指出使用者設定檔在 ASP.NET 網頁執行結束時是否會自動儲存。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user profile will be automatically saved at the end of the execution of an ASP.NET page; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者設定檔在 ASP.NET 網頁執行結束時會自動儲存，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.AutomaticSaveEnabled%2A> property indicates whether automatic saving of the user profile is enabled for the application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.AutomaticSaveEnabled%2A>屬性會指出是否啟用應用程式的自動儲存使用者設定檔。

trans-unit.source: If automatic saving is enabled, the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> object raises the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> event and calls the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase.Save%2A> method during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> event at the end of the execution of an ASP.NET page.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用自動儲存，<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>物件引發<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>事件並呼叫<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase.Save%2A>方法期間<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest>事件結尾的 ASP.NET 網頁的執行。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.AutomaticSaveEnabled%2A> property is set using the `automaticSaveEnabled` attribute of the element in the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.AutomaticSaveEnabled%2A>屬性會設定使用`automaticSaveEnabled`ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following configuration file excerpt shows the element in the section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 下列組態檔摘錄 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案的區段中顯示的項目。

trans-unit.source: It specifies the application's default profile provider to a <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider> instance and sets the `automaticSaveEnabled` attribute to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 它會指定應用程式的預設設定檔提供者<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>執行個體和設定`automaticSaveEnabled`屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to get the <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.AutomaticSaveEnabled" /> property value without at least <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Medium" /> permission.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試取得 <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.AutomaticSaveEnabled" /> 屬性值，但是不具備至少 <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Medium" /> 以上的使用權限。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption" /> enumeration values, specifying whether anonymous, authenticated, or both types of profiles are deleted.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption" /> 的其中一個列舉值，指定是否要刪除匿名、已驗證或是這兩種類型的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that identifies which user profiles are considered inactive.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，識別哪些使用者設定檔視為非現用。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate" /> of a user profile occurs on or before this date and time, the profile is considered inactive.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者設定檔的 <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate" /> 發生在這個日期與時間或之前，則會將其視為非使用中設定檔。

trans-unit.source: Deletes user profile data for which the last activity date and time occurred before the specified date and time.
trans-unit.target: 刪除使用者設定檔資料，其中設定檔的上次活動日期和時間發生在指定的日期和時間之前。

trans-unit.source: The number of profiles deleted from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 從資料來源中刪除的設定檔數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.DeleteInactiveProfiles%2A> method is used to remove unused profile data from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.DeleteInactiveProfiles%2A>方法用來從指定的應用程式的資料來源中移除未使用的設定檔資料`applicationName`組態檔中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched.
trans-unit.target: 使用`authenticationOption`參數來指定您是否只有匿名設定檔，只會驗證設定檔或要搜尋的所有設定檔。

trans-unit.source: Of the searched profiles, any profile with a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate%2A> that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 任何設定檔的搜尋的設定檔與<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>，就會發生在或之前指定`userInactiveSinceDate`會刪除參數值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.DeleteInactiveProfiles%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.DeleteInactiveProfiles%2A> method of the default profile provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.DeleteInactiveProfiles%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.DeleteInactiveProfiles%2A>方法的預設設定檔提供者。

trans-unit.source: The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的預設設定檔提供者`defaultProvider`組態項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, the profile information in the other data source is not deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者設定檔包含非預設的提供者設定檔提供者所管理的屬性，將不會刪除其他資料來源中的設定檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: To delete inactive profiles that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A> property and call the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.DeleteInactiveProfiles%2A> method of the provider directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要刪除非使用中預設的提供者以外的設定檔提供者所管理的設定檔，取得使用的設定檔提供者的參考<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A>屬性並呼叫<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.DeleteInactiveProfiles%2A>的提供者直接的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that manages inactive profiles.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示的 ASP.NET 網頁，管理非使用中的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: A button is provided to delete all profiles that have been unused for the specified number of days and are therefore considered inactive.
trans-unit.target: 若要刪除已被指定數天內未使用，因此視為非使用中的所有設定檔提供的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: The user name for the profile to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 要刪除的設定檔之使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the profile for the specified user name from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 從資料來源刪除指定使用者名稱的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user profile was found and deleted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到並刪除使用者設定檔則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.DeleteProfile%2A> method deletes all profile information and properties for the user profile for the specified `username` from the data source for the specified <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ApplicationName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.DeleteProfile%2A>方法會刪除所有設定檔資訊和指定的使用者設定檔屬性`username`從指定的資料來源<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ApplicationName%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.DeleteProfile%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.DeleteProfiles%2A> method of the default profile provider to perform the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.DeleteProfile%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.DeleteProfiles%2A>方法來執行刪除作業的預設設定檔提供者。

trans-unit.source: The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的預設設定檔提供者`defaultProvider`組態項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, they are not deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者設定檔包含非預設的提供者設定檔提供者所管理的屬性，不會刪除它們。

trans-unit.source: To delete profile properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A> property and call the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.DeleteProfiles%2A> method of the provider directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要刪除預設的提供者以外的設定檔提供者所管理的設定檔屬性，取得使用的設定檔提供者的參考<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A>屬性並呼叫<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.DeleteProfiles%2A>的提供者直接的方法。

trans-unit.source: Deletes profile properties and information from the data source for a supplied list of profiles.
trans-unit.target: 從資料來源刪除提供的設定檔清單之設定檔屬性和資訊。

trans-unit.source: A string array of user names for profiles to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 字串陣列，包含要刪除的設定檔之使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: Deletes profile properties and information for the supplied list of user names.
trans-unit.target: 刪除提供的使用者名稱清單之設定檔屬性和資訊。

trans-unit.source: The number of profiles deleted from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 從資料來源中刪除的設定檔數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.DeleteProfiles%2A> method deletes all profile information and properties for the specified profiles from the data source for the application specified by the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ApplicationName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.DeleteProfiles%2A>方法會從指定的應用程式的資料來源刪除所有設定檔資訊和指定的設定檔屬性<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ApplicationName%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The list of profiles to delete is specified as a string array of user names.
trans-unit.target: 若要刪除的設定檔的清單已指定為使用者名稱的字串陣列。

trans-unit.source: If profile properties and information exist in the data source for a user name in the `usernames` parameter, they are deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果設定檔內容及資訊存在於資料來源中的使用者名稱`usernames`參數，就會刪除它們。

trans-unit.source: The return value may differ from the length of the specified array of `usernames`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的值可能不同於指定之陣列的長度`usernames`。

trans-unit.source: This indicates that some of the profiles in the specified array of `usernames` were already deleted from the data store.
trans-unit.target: 這表示指定的陣列中的設定檔的某些`usernames`已經從資料存放區刪除。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.DeleteProfiles%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.DeleteProfiles%2A> method of the default profile provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.DeleteProfiles%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.DeleteProfiles%2A>方法的預設設定檔提供者。

trans-unit.source: The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的預設設定檔提供者`defaultProvider`組態項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, they are not deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者設定檔包含非預設的提供者設定檔提供者所管理的屬性，不會刪除它們。

trans-unit.source: To delete profile properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A> property and call the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.DeleteProfiles%2A> method of the provider directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要刪除預設的提供者以外的設定檔提供者所管理的設定檔屬性，取得使用的設定檔提供者的參考<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A>屬性並呼叫<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.DeleteProfiles%2A>的提供者直接的方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection" /> that contains profile information for profiles to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection" />，包含要刪除之設定檔的設定檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: Deletes profile properties and information from the data source for the supplied list of profiles.
trans-unit.target: 從資料來源刪除提供的設定檔清單之設定檔屬性和資訊。

trans-unit.source: The number of profiles deleted from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 從資料來源中刪除的設定檔數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.DeleteProfiles%2A> method deletes all profile information and properties for the specified profiles from the data source for the application specified by the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ApplicationName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.DeleteProfiles%2A>方法會從指定的應用程式的資料來源刪除所有設定檔資訊和指定的設定檔屬性<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ApplicationName%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The list of profiles to delete is specified using a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection> that is passed as the `profiles` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的設定檔，以刪除清單<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>傳遞做為`profiles`參數。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection> can be returned from the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.GetAllProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>可從傳回<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.GetAllProfiles%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that the return value may differ from the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection.Count%2A> value for the supplied <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，傳回值，可能會有所不同<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection.Count%2A>所提供的值<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>。

trans-unit.source: This indicates that some of the profiles in the specified <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection> were already deleted from the data store.
trans-unit.target: 這表示在指定的設定檔的某些<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>已經從資料存放區刪除。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.DeleteProfiles%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.DeleteProfiles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the default profile provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.DeleteProfiles%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.DeleteProfiles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法的預設設定檔提供者。

trans-unit.source: The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的預設設定檔提供者`defaultProvider`組態項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, they are not deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者設定檔包含非預設的提供者設定檔提供者所管理的屬性，不會刪除它們。

trans-unit.source: To delete profile properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A> property and call the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.DeleteProfiles%2A> method of the provider directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要刪除預設的提供者以外的設定檔提供者所管理的設定檔屬性，取得使用的設定檔提供者的參考<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A>屬性並呼叫<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.DeleteProfiles%2A>的提供者直接的方法。

One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo" /> objects in <paramref name="profiles" /> has a <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.UserName" /> that is an empty string ("") or contains a comma.

One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo" /> objects in <paramref name="profiles" /> has a <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.UserName" /> that is <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the user profile is enabled for the application.
trans-unit.target: 取得布林值，指出應用程式是否啟用使用者設定檔。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user profile is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者設定檔啟用，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The user profile is enabled for an application using the `enabled` attribute of the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 使用者設定檔已啟用應用程式使用`enabled`組態項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the element in the section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application where the user profile has been enabled.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示已啟用的使用者設定檔的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案的區段中的項目。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves profile information for profiles in which the last activity date occurred on or before a specified date and time and the user name for the profile matches a specified name.
trans-unit.target: 擷取上次活動日期發生在指定日期和時間或之前，而且設定檔使用者名稱符合指定名稱的設定檔之設定檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption" /> enumeration values, specifying whether anonymous, authenticated, or both types of profiles are returned.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption" /> 的其中一個列舉值，指定是否要傳回匿名、已驗證或是這兩種類型的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The user name for which to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that identifies which user profiles are considered inactive.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，識別哪些使用者設定檔視為非現用。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate" /> of a user profile occurs on or before this date and time, the profile is considered inactive.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者設定檔的 <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate" /> 發生在這個日期與時間或之前，則會將其視為非使用中設定檔。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves profile information for all profiles in which the last activity date occurred on or before the specified date and time and the user name for the profile matches the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 擷取上次活動日期發生在指定的日期和時間或之前，而且設定檔使用者名稱符合指定名稱的所有設定檔之設定檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection" /> containing user profile information for inactive profiles in which the user name matches the supplied <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection" />，包含非現用設定檔的使用者設定檔資訊，其中使用者名稱符合所提供的 <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> 參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> method is used to retrieve profile information for all unused user profiles for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>方法用來擷取指定的應用程式的所有未使用的使用者設定檔的設定檔資訊`applicationName`組態檔中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method will only retrieve profiles for which the profile user name matches the supplied `usernameToMatch` parameter value.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法只會擷取的設定檔的使用者名稱符合所提供的設定檔`usernameToMatch`參數值。

trans-unit.source: Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched.
trans-unit.target: 使用`authenticationOption`參數來指定您是否只有匿名設定檔，只會驗證設定檔或要搜尋的所有設定檔。

trans-unit.source: Of the searched profiles, any profile with a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate%2A> that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 任何設定檔的搜尋的設定檔與<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>，就會發生在或之前指定`userInactiveSinceDate`傳回參數的值。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve this information in pages of data using the overload for the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%28System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%40%29> method that takes additional `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 您可以擷取這項資訊使用的多載的資料頁面中<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%28System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%40%29>採用其他方法`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。

trans-unit.source: Your profile provider may support wildcard characters in the `usernameToMatch` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 您的設定檔提供者可能支援在中的使用萬用字元`usernameToMatch`參數。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider> class supports wildcard characters in the `usernameToMatch` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>類別支援在中的使用萬用字元`usernameToMatch`參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the default profile provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法的預設設定檔提供者。

trans-unit.source: The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的預設設定檔提供者`defaultProvider`組態項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, the data source for the other profile provider is not searched.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者設定檔包含非預設的提供者設定檔提供者所管理的屬性，將不會搜尋其他設定檔提供者的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: To find inactive profiles that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A> property and call the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> method of the provider directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要尋找非使用中預設的提供者以外的設定檔提供者所管理的設定檔，取得使用的設定檔提供者的參考<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A>屬性並呼叫<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>的提供者直接的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example allows a user to supply a `usernameToMatch` value and a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption> enumeration value and retrieves profile information for any matching profiles.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例可讓使用者提供`usernameToMatch`值和<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption>列舉值和擷取設定檔的任何相符的設定檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: The sample allows the user to specify whether to return only inactive profiles.
trans-unit.target: 此範例可讓使用者能夠指定是否要傳回僅非作用中的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: If the user specifies only inactive profiles, the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> method is called; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindProfilesByUserName%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者指定只有非作用中設定檔，<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>方法是呼叫，否則<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> 為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption" /> values, specifying whether anonymous, authenticated, or both types of profiles are returned.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption" /> 的其中一個值，指定是否要傳回匿名、已驗證或是這兩種類型的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The user name for which to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that identifies which user profiles are considered inactive.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，識別哪些使用者設定檔視為非現用。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate" /> of a user profile occurs on or before this date and time, the profile is considered inactive.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者設定檔的 <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate" /> 發生在這個日期與時間或之前，則會將其視為非使用中設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The index of the page of results to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的結果頁面索引。

trans-unit.source: <c>pageIndex</c> is zero-based.
trans-unit.target: <c>pageIndex</c> 以零為起始。

trans-unit.source: The size of the page of results to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的結果頁面大小。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains an integer that identifies the total number of profiles.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，包含識別設定檔總數的整數。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves profile information in pages of data for profiles in which the last activity date occurred on or before the specified date and time and the user name for the profile matches the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 以分頁資料的形式，擷取上次活動日期發生在指定的日期和時間或之前，而且設定檔使用者名稱符合指定名稱的設定檔之設定檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection" /> containing user profile information for inactive profiles where the user name matches the supplied <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection" />，包含非現用設定檔的使用者設定檔資訊，其中使用者名稱符合所提供的 <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> 參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> method is used to retrieve profile information for unused user profiles for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>方法用來擷取指定的應用程式的未使用的使用者設定檔的設定檔資訊`applicationName`組態檔中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method will only retrieve profiles for which the user name matches the supplied `usernameToMatch` parameter value.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法只會擷取使用者名稱符合所提供的設定檔`usernameToMatch`參數值。

trans-unit.source: Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched.
trans-unit.target: 使用`authenticationOption`參數來指定您是否只有匿名設定檔，只會驗證設定檔或要搜尋的所有設定檔。

trans-unit.source: Of the searched profiles, any profile is returned that has a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate%2A> that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋的設定任何的檔設定檔會傳回具有<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>，就會發生在或之前指定`userInactiveSinceDate`參數值。

trans-unit.source: The results returned by <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的結果<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。

trans-unit.source: The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo> objects to return in the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: `pageSize`參數識別的最大數目<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo>物件中傳回<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>集合。

trans-unit.source: The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return; 0 identifies the first page.
trans-unit.target: `pageIndex`參數識別要傳回的結果的分頁，則為 0 識別的第一頁。

trans-unit.source: The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the configured `applicationName`, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters.
trans-unit.target: `totalRecords`參數是`out`參數設為非作用中的使用者設定檔所設定的總數`applicationName`根據`authenticationOption`和`userInactiveSinceDate`參數。

trans-unit.source: For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection> returned will contain the sixth through the tenth inactive profiles.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果有設定 13 使用者`applicationName`，和`pageIndex`值為 1 以`pageSize`5，<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>傳回包含第 6 到第十個非使用中的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The `totalRecords` parameter will be set to 13.
trans-unit.target: `totalRecords`參數會設定為 13。

trans-unit.source: Note that your profile provider may support wildcard characters in the `usernameToMatch` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，您的設定檔提供者可能支援在中的使用萬用字元`usernameToMatch`參數。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider> class supports wildcard characters in the `usernameToMatch` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>類別支援在中的使用萬用字元`usernameToMatch`參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> method of the default profile provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>方法的預設設定檔提供者。

trans-unit.source: The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的預設設定檔提供者`defaultProvider`組態項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, the data source for the other profile provider is not searched.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者設定檔包含非預設的提供者設定檔提供者所管理的屬性，將不會搜尋其他設定檔提供者的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: To find inactive profiles that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A> property and call the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> method of the provider directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要尋找非使用中預設的提供者以外的設定檔提供者所管理的設定檔，取得使用的設定檔提供者的參考<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A>屬性並呼叫<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>的提供者直接的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example allows a user to supply a `usernameToMatch` value and a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption> value and retrieves profile information for any matching profiles.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例可讓使用者提供`usernameToMatch`值和<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption>值，並擷取任何比對設定檔的設定檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: The example allows the user to specify whether to return inactive profiles exclusively.
trans-unit.target: 此範例可讓使用者能夠指定是否要以獨佔方式傳回非作用中的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: If the user specifies only inactive profiles, the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> method is called; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindProfilesByUserName%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者指定只有非作用中設定檔，<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>方法是呼叫，否則<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> 為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="pageIndex" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pageIndex" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="pageSize" /> is less than 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pageSize" /> 小於 1。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="pageIndex" /> multiplied by <paramref name="pageSize" /> is larger than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pageIndex" /> 乘以 <paramref name="pageSize" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves profile information for profiles in which the user name matches a specified name.
trans-unit.target: 擷取使用者名稱符合指定名稱的設定檔之設定檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption" /> enumeration values, specifying whether anonymous, authenticated, or both types of profiles are returned.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption" /> 的其中一個列舉值，指定是否要傳回匿名、已驗證或是這兩種類型的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The user name for which to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves all profile information for profiles in which the user name matches the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 擷取使用者名稱符合指定名稱的設定檔之所有設定檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection" /> containing user profile information for profiles where the user name matches the supplied <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection" />，包含設定檔的使用者設定檔資訊，其中使用者名稱符合所提供的 <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> 參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindProfilesByUserName%2A> method returns a list of all profile information for which the user name matches the supplied `usernameToMatch` parameter value for the configured <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ApplicationName%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>方法會傳回所有設定檔資訊的使用者名稱符合所提供清單`usernameToMatch`所設定的參數值<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ApplicationName%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched.
trans-unit.target: 使用`authenticationOption`參數來指定您是否只有匿名設定檔，只會驗證設定檔或要搜尋的所有設定檔。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve profile information for user profiles in pages of data using the overload for the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindProfilesByUserName%2A> method that takes additional `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 您可以擷取使用的多載的資料頁面中的使用者設定檔的設定檔資訊<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>採用其他方法`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。

trans-unit.source: Note that your profile provider may support wildcard characters in the `usernameToMatch` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，您的設定檔提供者可能支援在中的使用萬用字元`usernameToMatch`參數。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider> class supports wildcard characters in the `usernameToMatch` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>類別支援在中的使用萬用字元`usernameToMatch`參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindProfilesByUserName%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A> method of the default profile provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>方法的預設設定檔提供者。

trans-unit.source: Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched.
trans-unit.target: 使用`authenticationOption`參數來指定您是否只有匿名設定檔，只會驗證設定檔或要搜尋的所有設定檔。

trans-unit.source: Note that your profile provider may support wildcard characters in the `usernameToMatch` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，您的設定檔提供者可能支援在中的使用萬用字元`usernameToMatch`參數。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider> class supports wildcard characters in the `usernameToMatch` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>類別支援在中的使用萬用字元`usernameToMatch`參數。

trans-unit.source: The results returned by <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindProfilesByUserName%2A> are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的結果<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。

trans-unit.source: The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo> objects to return in the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>.
trans-unit.target: `pageSize`參數識別的最大數目<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo>物件中傳回<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return; zero identifies the first page.
trans-unit.target: `pageIndex`參數會識別哪一頁的結果，傳回; 零識別的第一頁。

trans-unit.source: The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file, based on the supplied `authenticationOption`.
trans-unit.target: `totalRecords`參數是`out`參數設為指定的應用程式的非作用中的使用者設定檔的總數`applicationName`屬性在組態檔中，根據所提供`authenticationOption`。

trans-unit.source: For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection> returned will contain the sixth through the tenth profiles.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果有設定 13 使用者`applicationName`，和`pageIndex`值為 1 以`pageSize`5，<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>傳回包含第 6 到第十個設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The `totalRecords` parameter will be set to 13.
trans-unit.target: `totalRecords`參數會設定為 13。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> method of the default profile provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>方法的預設設定檔提供者。

trans-unit.source: The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的預設設定檔提供者`defaultProvider`組態項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, the data source for the other profile provider is not searched.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者設定檔包含非預設的提供者設定檔提供者所管理的屬性，將不會搜尋其他設定檔提供者的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: To find profiles that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A> property and call the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> method of the provider directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要尋找預設的提供者以外的設定檔提供者所管理的設定檔，取得使用的設定檔提供者的參考<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A>屬性並呼叫<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>的提供者直接的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example allows a user to supply a `usernameToMatch` value and a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption> and retrieves profile information for any matching profiles.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例可讓使用者提供`usernameToMatch`值和<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption>和擷取設定檔的任何相符的設定檔的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The example allows the user to specify whether to return inactive profiles exclusively.
trans-unit.target: 此範例可讓使用者能夠指定是否要以獨佔方式傳回非作用中的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: If the user specifies only inactive profiles, the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> method is called; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindProfilesByUserName%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者指定只有非作用中設定檔，<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>方法是呼叫，否則<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> 為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="pageIndex" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pageIndex" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="pageSize" /> is less than 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pageSize" /> 小於 1。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="pageIndex" /> multiplied by <paramref name="pageSize" /> is larger than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pageIndex" /> 乘以 <paramref name="pageSize" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves user profile data for profiles in which the last activity date occurred on or before a specified date and time.
trans-unit.target: 擷取上次活動日期發生在指定日期和時間或之前的設定檔之使用者設定檔資料。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption" /> enumeration values, specifying whether anonymous, authenticated, or both types of profiles are returned.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption" /> 的其中一個列舉值，指定是否要傳回匿名、已驗證或是這兩種類型的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that identifies which user profiles are considered inactive.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，識別哪些使用者設定檔視為非現用。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate" /> of a user profile occurs on or before this date and time, the profile is considered inactive.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者設定檔的 <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate" /> 發生在這個日期與時間或之前，則會將其視為非使用中設定檔。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves all user profile data for profiles in which the last activity date occurred on or before the specified date and time.
trans-unit.target: 擷取上次活動日期發生在指定的日期和時間或之前的設定檔之所有使用者設定檔資料。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection" /> containing user profile information about the inactive profiles.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection" />，包含關於非現用設定檔的使用者設定檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A> method is used to retrieve profile information from the data source for all unused user profiles for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A>方法用來擷取所指定的應用程式的所有未使用的使用者設定檔的資料來源的設定檔資訊`applicationName`組態檔中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched.
trans-unit.target: 使用`authenticationOption`參數來指定您是否只有匿名設定檔，只會驗證設定檔或要搜尋的所有設定檔。

trans-unit.source: Of the searched profiles, any profile is returned that has a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate%2A> that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋的設定任何的檔設定檔會傳回具有<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>，就會發生在或之前指定`userInactiveSinceDate`參數值。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve profile information for inactive user profiles in pages of data using the overload for the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A> method that takes additional `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 您可以擷取使用的多載的資料頁面中的非作用中的使用者設定檔的設定檔資訊<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A>採用其他方法`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A> method of the default profile provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A>方法的預設設定檔提供者。

trans-unit.source: The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的預設設定檔提供者`defaultProvider`組態項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, the data source for the other profile provider is not searched.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者設定檔包含非預設的提供者設定檔提供者所管理的屬性，將不會搜尋其他設定檔提供者的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: To find unused profiles that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A> property and call the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A> method of the provider directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要尋找未使用的預設提供者以外的設定檔提供者所管理的設定檔，取得使用的設定檔提供者的參考<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A>屬性並呼叫<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A>的提供者直接的方法。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示的 ASP.NET 網頁，管理非使用中的設定檔。

trans-unit.target: 提供的按鈕來刪除非使用中的所有設定檔。

trans-unit.target: 設定檔是否視為非使用中時，根據針對指定的日期`userInactiveSinceDate`參數。

trans-unit.source: The index of the page of results to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的結果頁面索引。

trans-unit.source: <c>pageIndex</c> is zero-based.
trans-unit.target: <c>pageIndex</c> 以零為起始。

trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，包含識別設定檔總數的整數。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a page of <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo" /> objects for user profiles in which the last activity date occurred on or before the specified date and time.
trans-unit.target: 擷取使用者設定檔之 <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo" /> 物件的某個頁面，其中設定檔的上次活動日期發生在指定的日期和時間或之前。

trans-unit.source: Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched.
trans-unit.target: 使用`authenticationOption`參數來指定您是否只有匿名設定檔，只會驗證設定檔或要搜尋的所有設定檔。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve pages of <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo> objects for user profiles using the overload for the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.GetAllProfiles%2A> method that takes additional `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 您可以擷取的頁面<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo>物件使用的多載的使用者設定檔<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.GetAllProfiles%2A>採用其他方法`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.GetAllProfiles%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A> method of the default profile provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.GetAllProfiles%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A>方法的預設設定檔提供者。

trans-unit.source: The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的預設設定檔提供者`defaultProvider`組態項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, the data source for the other profile provider is not searched.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者設定檔包含非預設的提供者設定檔提供者所管理的屬性，將不會搜尋其他設定檔提供者的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: To find profiles that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A> property and call the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A> method of the provider directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要尋找預設的提供者以外的設定檔提供者所管理的設定檔，取得使用的設定檔提供者的參考<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A>屬性並呼叫<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A>的提供者直接的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays profile information for all of the profiles for the configured `applicationName`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示所有設定的設定檔的設定檔資訊`applicationName`。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption" /> enumeration values, specifying whether anonymous, authenticated, or both types of profiles are returned.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption" /> 的其中一個列舉值，指定是否要傳回匿名、已驗證或是這兩種類型的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The index of the page of results to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的結果頁面索引。

trans-unit.source: <c>pageIndex</c> is zero-based.
trans-unit.target: <c>pageIndex</c> 以零為起始。

trans-unit.source: The size of the page of results to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的結果頁面大小。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains an integer that identifies the total number of profiles.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，包含識別設定檔總數的整數。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves pages of user profile data.
trans-unit.target: 擷取使用者設定檔資料的頁面。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection" /> containing user profile information for all of the profiles in the data source.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection" />，包含資料來源中所有設定檔的使用者設定檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.GetAllProfiles%2A> method is used to retrieve profile information from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.GetAllProfiles%2A>方法用來擷取指定的應用程式的資料來源的設定檔資訊`applicationName`組態檔中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched.
trans-unit.target: 使用`authenticationOption`參數來指定您是否只有匿名設定檔，只會驗證設定檔或要搜尋的所有設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The results returned by <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A> are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的結果<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A>受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。

trans-unit.source: The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo> objects to return in the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>.
trans-unit.target: `pageSize`參數識別的最大數目<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo>物件中傳回<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return; zero identifies the first page.
trans-unit.target: `pageIndex`參數會識別哪一頁的結果，傳回; 零識別的第一頁。

trans-unit.source: The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the configured `applicationName`, based on the supplied `authenticationOption`.
trans-unit.target: `totalRecords`參數是`out`參數設為非作用中的使用者設定檔所設定的總數`applicationName`，根據提供`authenticationOption`。

trans-unit.source: For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is one with a `pageSize` of 5, the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection> returned will contain the sixth through the tenth profiles.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果沒有設定 13 使用者`applicationName`，和`pageIndex`值是具有`pageSize`5，<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>傳回包含第 6 到第十個設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The `totalRecords` parameter will be set to 13.
trans-unit.target: `totalRecords`參數會設定為 13。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.GetAllProfiles%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A> method of the default profile provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.GetAllProfiles%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A>方法的預設設定檔提供者。

trans-unit.source: The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的預設設定檔提供者`defaultProvider`組態項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, the data source for the other profile provider is not searched.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者設定檔包含非預設的提供者設定檔提供者所管理的屬性，將不會搜尋其他設定檔提供者的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: To find profiles that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A> property and call the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A> method of the provider directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要尋找預設的提供者以外的設定檔提供者所管理的設定檔，取得使用的設定檔提供者的參考<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A>屬性並呼叫<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A>的提供者直接的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays profile information for all of the profiles for the configured `applicationName` in pages of data.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示所有設定的設定檔的設定檔資訊`applicationName`資料頁面中。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption" /> enumeration values, specifying whether anonymous, authenticated, or both types of profiles are returned.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption" /> 的其中一個列舉值，指定是否要傳回匿名、已驗證或是這兩種類型的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object that identifies which user profiles are considered inactive.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件，識別哪些使用者設定檔視為非現用。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate" /> of a user profile occurs on or before this date and time, the profile is considered inactive.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者設定檔的 <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate" /> 發生在這個日期與時間或之前，則會將其視為非使用中設定檔。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of profiles in which the last activity date occurred on or before the specified date.
trans-unit.target: 取得上次活動日期發生在指定的日期當天或之前的設定檔數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of profiles in the data source for which the last activity date occurred before the specified date and time.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源中上次活動日期發生在指定的日期和時間之前的設定檔數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.GetNumberOfInactiveProfiles%2A> method is used to retrieve a count of all of the unused user profiles from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.GetNumberOfInactiveProfiles%2A>方法用來從指定的應用程式的資料來源擷取的未使用的使用者設定檔的所有計數`applicationName`組態檔中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched.
trans-unit.target: 使用`authenticationOption`參數來指定您是否只有匿名設定檔，只會驗證設定檔或要搜尋的所有設定檔。

trans-unit.source: Of the searched profiles, all profiles are counted that have a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate%2A> that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋的設定檔中，所有設定檔會計算有<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>，就會發生在或之前指定`userInactiveSinceDate`參數值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example allows a user to view and delete information for active and inactive profiles based on search criteria.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例可讓使用者檢視和刪除使用中和非使用中根據搜尋條件的設定檔的資訊。

trans-unit.source: A count of inactive profiles is displayed using the results of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.GetNumberOfInactiveProfiles%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用的結果顯示非作用中的設定檔的計數<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.GetNumberOfInactiveProfiles%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption" /> enumeration values, specifying whether anonymous, authenticated, or both types of profiles are returned.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption" /> 的其中一個列舉值，指定是否要傳回匿名、已驗證或是這兩種類型的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of profiles in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料來源中的設定檔數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of profiles in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源中的設定檔數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.GetNumberOfProfiles%2A> method is used to retrieve a count of all of the user profiles from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.GetNumberOfProfiles%2A>方法用來從指定的應用程式的資料來源中擷取所有使用者設定檔的計數`applicationName`組態檔中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched.
trans-unit.target: 使用`authenticationOption`參數來指定您是否只有匿名設定檔，只會驗證設定檔或要搜尋的所有設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays profile information for all of the profiles for the configured `applicationName` and also returns the number of profiles.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示所有設定的設定檔的設定檔資訊`applicationName`，也會傳回設定檔的數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the default profile provider for the application.
trans-unit.target: 取得應用程式預設設定檔提供者的參考。

trans-unit.source: The default profile provider for the application.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式的預設設定檔提供者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Provider%2A> property enables you to reference the default profile provider for an application directly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Provider%2A>屬性可讓您直接參考應用程式的預設設定檔提供者。

trans-unit.source: This is commonly used to access custom members of the profile provider that are not part of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider> abstract base class.
trans-unit.target: 這通常用來存取自訂的設定檔提供者的成員不屬於<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider>抽象基底類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example lists properties of the default profile provider.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會列出預設的設定檔提供者的屬性。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to get the <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Provider" /> property value without at least <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Medium" /> permission.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試取得 <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Provider" /> 屬性值，但是不具備至少 <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Medium" /> 以上的使用權限。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the profile providers for the ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 取得 ASP.NET 應用程式的設定檔提供者集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProviderCollection" /> of the profile providers configured for the ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 針對 ASP.NET 應用程式所設之設定檔提供者的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProviderCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A> property references all of the profile providers enabled for an application, including providers added in the machine configuration and providers added in all Web.config files.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A>屬性會參考所有啟用的應用程式的設定檔提供者，包括提供者加入電腦組態中，並提供者加入所有 Web.config 檔案。

trans-unit.source: You can control which profile providers are available for an application using the element of the section in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 您可以控制哪一個設定檔提供者可供使用的項目區段的組態檔中的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following Web.config file removes the profile providers specified in parent configuration files and adds a <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider> instance as the profile provider for the application.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列 Web.config 檔案中移除父組態檔中指定的設定檔提供者，並將<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>與應用程式的設定檔提供者執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When specifying the section, you must specify a default provider by setting the `defaultProvider` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的區段時，您必須指定預設提供者藉由設定`defaultProvider`屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a section in your Web.config file, the values from the machine configuration are used and the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider> instance named AspNetSqlProvider is established as the default provider.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未在 Web.config 檔案中指定區段，會使用電腦組態中的值和<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>做為預設提供者建立名為 Languagekeyword>aspnetsqlprovider< 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain a strongly typed reference to a provider from the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A> collection by indexing the profile provider by name and casting it as the desired type.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取得的提供者的強型別的參考<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A>索引名稱的設定檔提供者，並將它轉型為所需的型別集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example lists the providers enabled for an application and their respective types.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會列出啟用應用程式和其各自的型別提供者。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to get the <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers" /> property value without at least <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Medium" /> permission.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試取得 <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers" /> 屬性值，但是不具備至少 <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Medium" /> 以上的使用權限。
